name: Healing Smile
effects: Cure Sleep, Silence, Poison, Petrify, Paralyze, Disease, Confusion and Blind for one ally

name: Healing Smile
微笑治癒
웃음의 치유
Sourire apaisant
Heilendes Lächeln
Sonrisa sanadora
desc_short: Cure poison, blind, sleep, silence, paralysis, confusion, disease and stone, and fully restore HP for one ally
治療1名隊員中毒失明睡眠沉默麻痺混亂生病石化的狀態+完全恢復HP
아군 1명의 독, 암흑, 수면, 침묵, 마비, 혼란, 질병, 석화 회복+HP 모두 회복
Soigne pois., céc., som., sil., para., conf., mala. et pétri et restaure entièrement les PV d'un allié
Heilt Gift, Blenden, Schlaf, Stille,Lähmung, Konfus, Virus und Stein, heilt LP komplett, ein Verb.
Cura ven, ceg, sue, sil, par, con, enf y pie a un aliado y recupera toda su VIT
desc_long: Cures poison, blind, sleep, silence, paralysis, confusion, disease and stone, and fully restores HP for one ally.
治療1名隊員中毒失明睡眠沉默麻痺混亂生病石化的狀態，同時完全恢復HP。
아군 1명의 독, 암흑, 수면, 침묵, 마비, 혼란, 질병, 석화를 회복하고, HP를 모두 회복합니다.
Soigne pois., céc., som., sil., para., conf., mala. et pétri et restaure entièrement les PV d'un allié
Heilt Gift, Blenden, Schlaf, Stille,Lähmung, Konfus, Virus und Stein, heilt LP komplett, ein Verb.
Cura veneno, ceguera, sueño, silencio, parálisis, confusión, enfermedad y piedra a un aliado y recupera toda su VIT.
